name: Learn Italian free for beginners
description: How to Learn Italian! The Italian game for beginners    Free   Offline   Lessons and exercises to practice ( read, write and speak ) this language by yourself   4 activities and exam - test for each topic.   36 topics and 3 levels Basic: Alphabet letters , Numbers , Colors , Verbs , Food  Intermediate: Week Days , Animals , Clothes , Body  Advanced : Sports , House , Christmas , Music ,   500 words with image and audio , to study vocabulary   Native Italian pronunciation ( Italy )  Learning Italian fast at home with our course in your mobile / tablet   You will not need an English to Italian translation or a dictionary anymore!  Learn to speak Italian, English , Spanish, Portuguese, French, German with our apps  One of the best games to learn languages   Copyright: IMPORTANT: We are owners and have copyright of all sounds words Images have been obtained under licensed Creative Commons CC0
